overview: What happens when people are out of ideas and product to sell at the film markets?  They put together pieces of several kung-fu films with Bruce Le and call it Bruce's Last Battle! Bruce fights villain after villain as the ever-changing plot never stops in this non-stop madness!  Shelved for years by 21st Century Distribution, madman Tom Ward has finally let it loose to make its home video debut!
title: Bruce's Secret Kung Fu
